definition: to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
look/external appearance/design/overall brand look or logo that can be patented

sentences.english: In the article 50 Totally Free Lessons in Graphic Design Theory the TutsPlus family definitely delivers with a bevy of knowledge building lessons in theory

sentences.english: Precise design of complete machine, compact conformation, handiness and simplicity.
sentences.chinese: 整机设计精致，结构紧凑，操作方便简洁。

sentences.english: To solve the problem, the welding joint construction was re-designed and argon-arc welding was employed.
sentences.chinese: 解决措施为采用氩弧焊，改进焊接结构设计等。

sentences.english: I think the EDG probably uses a low astigmatism eyepiece design like the SE.
sentences.chinese: 我想EDG可能使用了象SE一样的低像散目镜设计。

sentences.english: The unique design and construction is what makes it so effective.

sentences.english: I also worked at an insurance company for my graduate field work.
sentences.chinese: 并且我在一家保险公司进行了我的毕业设计。

sentences.english: Post-simulation shows that the deserializer meets the design requirements.

sentences.english: It is used for petroleum exploration and engineering tasks such as simulating aircraft designs.

sentences.english: Finally, some advice was put forward on the research directions of FOD tolerance design technology in China.
sentences.chinese: 最后对我国外物损伤容限设计的研究方向提出了建议。

sentences.english: How to defense collusive attack is the key problems for the designing of fingerprinting.
sentences.chinese: 所以设计指纹算法的关键问题是如何防范合谋攻击。

sentences.english: Our design originated from the cloth of Zhouzi high school students with some improvement. " The designer told us."

sentences.english: Finally, an application example of excavator design was proposed to illuminate the reconstruction of traditional functions.

definition: line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
